verses.verse: <S%G2532>And<s%> it came to <S%G1096>pass<s%>, <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had made an <S%G5055>end<s%> of <S%G1299>commanding<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%>, he <S%G3327>departed<s%> <S%G1564>thence<s%> to <S%G1321>teach<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G2784>preach<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4172>cities<s%>.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> when <S%G2491>John<s%> had <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1201>prison<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, he <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%>,
And <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G1488>Art<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> he that should <S%G2064>come<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> do we <S%G4328>look<s%> for <S%G2087>another<s%>?

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G4198>Go<s%> and <S%G518>shew<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G518>again<s%> those things <S%G3739>which<s%> ye do <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G991>see<s%>:

The <S%G5185>blind<s%> receive their <S%G308>sight<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5560>lame<s%> <S%G4043>walk<s%>, the <S%G3015>lepers<s%> are <S%G2511>cleansed<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2974>deaf<s%> <S%G191>hear<s%>, the <S%G3498>dead<s%> are raised <S%G1453>up<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4434>poor<s%> have the gospel preached to <S%G2097>them<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3107>blessed<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> he, <S%G3739>whosoever<s%> <S%G4624>shall<s%> <S%G3362>not<s%> be <S%G4624>offended<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1698>me<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G5130>as<s%> they <S%G4198>departed<s%>, <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G3004>say<s%> unto the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%>, <S%G5101>What<s%> went <S%G1831>ye<s%> out <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%> to <S%G2300>see<s%>? A <S%G2563>reed<s%> <S%G4531>shaken<s%> <S%G5259>with<s%> the <S%G417>wind<s%>?

<S%G235>But<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> went ye <S%G1831>out<s%> for to <S%G1492>see<s%>? A <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G294>clothed<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3120>soft<s%> <S%G2440>raiment<s%>? <S%G2400>behold<s%>, they that <S%G5409>wear<s%> <S%G3120>soft<s%> clothing <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G935>kings'<s%> <S%G3624>houses<s%>.

<S%G235>But<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> went ye <S%G1831>out<s%> for to <S%G1492>see<s%>? A <S%G4396>prophet<s%>? <S%G3483>yea<s%>, I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4055>more<s%> than a <S%G4396>prophet<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> he, <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%>, <S%G2400>Behold<s%>, <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G649>send<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G32>messenger<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4383>face<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> shall <S%G2680>prepare<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3598>way<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> <S%G4675>thee<s%>.

<S%G281>Verily<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G1722>Among<s%> them that are <S%G1084>born<s%> of <S%G1135>women<s%> there <S%G1453>hath<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1453>risen<s%> a greater <S%G3187>than<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> the <S%G910>Baptist<s%>: <S%G1161>notwithstanding<s%> he that is <S%G3398>least<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> greater <S%G3187>than<s%> <S%G846>he<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G2250>days<s%> of <S%G2491>John<s%> the <S%G910>Baptist<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G737>now<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> suffereth <S%G971>violence<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G973>violent<s%> <S%G726>take<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> by <S%G726>force<s%>. suffereth: or, is gotten by force, and they that thrust men
<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G4395>prophesied<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> ye <S%G2309>will<s%> <S%G1209>receive<s%> it, <S%G846>this<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G2243>Elias<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G3195>for<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%>.
He that <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G3775>ears<s%> to <S%G191>hear<s%>, let him <S%G191>hear<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G5101>whereunto<s%> shall I <S%G3666>liken<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G1074>generation<s%>? It <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> unto <S%G3808>children<s%> <S%G2521>sitting<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G58>markets<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4377>calling<s%> unto <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2083>fellows<s%>,

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%>, We have <S%G832>piped<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> ye <S%G3738>have<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3738>danced<s%>; we have <S%G2354>mourned<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> ye <S%G2875>have<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2875>lamented<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G3383>neither<s%> <S%G2068>eating<s%> <S%G3383>nor<s%> <S%G4095>drinking<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G3004>say<s%>, He <S%G2192>hath<s%> a <S%G1140>devil<s%>.

The <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G2068>eating<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4095>drinking<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G3004>say<s%>, <S%G2400>Behold<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G5314>gluttonous<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G3630>winebibber<s%>, a <S%G5384>friend<s%> of <S%G5057>publicans<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G268>sinners<s%>. <S%G2532>But<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> is <S%G1344>justified<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%>.

<S%G5119>Then<s%> began <S%G756>he<s%> to <S%G3679>upbraid<s%> the <S%G4172>cities<s%> <S%G1722>wherein<s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G4118>most<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> mighty <S%G1411>works<s%> were <S%G1096>done<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> they <S%G3340>repented<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>:

<S%G3759>Woe<s%> unto <S%G4671>thee<s%>, <S%G5523>Chorazin<s%>! <S%G3759>woe<s%> unto <S%G4671>thee<s%>, <S%G966>Bethsaida<s%>! <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> the mighty <S%G1411>works<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> were <S%G1096>done<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>, had been <S%G1096>done<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5184>Tyre<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4605>Sidon<s%>, they would have <S%G3340>repented<s%> long <S%G302>ago<s%> <S%G3819><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4526>sackcloth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4700>ashes<s%>.

<S%G4133>But<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, It shall <S%G2071>be<s%> more <S%G414>tolerable<s%> for <S%G5184>Tyre<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4605>Sidon<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G2920>judgment<s%>, <S%G2228>than<s%> for <S%G5213>you<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%>, <S%G2584>Capernaum<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> art <S%G5312>exalted<s%> <S%G2193>unto<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, shalt be brought <S%G2601>down<s%> <S%G2193>to<s%> <S%G86>hell<s%>: <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> the mighty <S%G1411>works<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> have been <S%G1096>done<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%>, had been <S%G1096>done<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4670>Sodom<s%>, it would have <S%G302>remained<s%> <S%G3306><s%> <S%G3360>until<s%> this <S%G4594>day<s%>.

<S%G4133>But<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G3754>That<s%> it shall <S%G2071>be<s%> more <S%G414>tolerable<s%> for the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G4670>Sodom<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G2920>judgment<s%>, <S%G2228>than<s%> for <S%G4671>thee<s%>.

<S%G1722>At<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%>, I <S%G1843>thank<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%>, O <S%G3962>Father<s%>, <S%G2962>Lord<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1093>earth<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> thou hast <S%G613>hid<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G4680>wise<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4908>prudent<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> hast <S%G601>revealed<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> unto <S%G3516>babes<s%>.
Even <S%G3483>so<s%>, <S%G3962>Father<s%>: <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> it <S%G1096>seemed<s%> <S%G2107>good<s%> in <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G1715>sight<s%>.

All <S%G3956>things<s%> are <S%G3860>delivered<s%> unto <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G1921>knoweth<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%>, <S%G1508>but<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%>; <S%G3761>neither<s%> <S%G1921>knoweth<s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%>, <S%G1508>save<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%>, and he <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3739>to<s%> <S%G1437>whomsoever<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G1014>will<s%> <S%G601>reveal<s%> him.

<S%G1205>Come<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%>, <S%G3956>all<s%> ye that <S%G2872>labour<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> are heavy <S%G5412>laden<s%>, and <S%G2504>I<s%> will <S%G373>give<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G373>rest<s%>.

<S%G142>Take<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2218>yoke<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3129>learn<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%>; <S%G3754>for<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G4235>meek<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5011>lowly<s%> in <S%G2588>heart<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> ye shall <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G372>rest<s%> unto <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5590>souls<s%>.
